casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Marcelo CERVANTES Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 17, 2017

Manuel A. Suarez, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Matthew R. Kalthoff, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, *232172 Conn.App. 74, 158 A.3d 430 (2017), is denied.
